PS3 Memory Card Adapter, Why the Hate?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: January 2013 Topics: PS3 Memory Card Adapter, Why the Hate?
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, January 23, 2013 - 09:55 am:

People keep posting here that there's no way to get a PSX save off a PS3, when Sony makes what appears to be a perfectly good memory card adapter for PS3. What gives?

By fiffa46 on Saturday, January 26, 2013 - 09:43 am:

I remember we used to sell this at gamestop. Though I haven't seen one there in a long time.

By qolf on Sunday, January 27, 2013 - 02:37 pm:

I got mine on Amazon last summer since my Monster
Rancher 2 stopped working on the ps1(strange because
it worked fine on the PS3,but other ps1 games worked
fine on the ps1 still).I think it's great, and its
much better having files saved on the system rather
than on the memory card itself. I don't really have
any complaints about it besides it takes a couple of
minutes to load the memory card.

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, January 27, 2013 - 08:01 pm:

Thanks for the info, that's good to know!
